question: This company is recognised as 'Startup of the Year' 2017 award at the 7th Small Business Awards, in New Delhi.
explanation: Milkbasket has been honoured with the 'Startup of the Year' 2017 award at the 7th Small Business Awards, in New Delhi. The Small Business Awards 2018 was organised by Franchise India Group. It honours the best enterprises among SMEs (Small or Medium Enterprise), SMB (Small and Medium Business) and emerging small-scale ventures. The startup of the year award is presented to SMEs that are 7 years or lesser than 7 years old with potential to develop into a larger entity in local and international markets.
